person_say: I've been really stressed lately, and it's keeping me up at night.
animal_say: It sounds like you've got a lot on your plate! There's a mindfulness master named Bruno the bear who can help you unwind and catch some good z's. Would you like to meet him?

person_say: I appreciate the offer, but I don't really think a bear can help me with my sleep issues.
animal_say: Got it! Just to make sure I find the right help for you, do you think you'd benefit more from relaxation techniques or perhaps tips to manage your time and stress better?
